name: Dark Reddit Web 2.0
description:
This is based on this style http://userstyles.org/styles/33832 by reddit user "joeally" which is based on style http://userstyles.org/styles/33832 by reddit user "eightfivezero".

It's a simply a darkened version of the userstyle that works well with commentboxes here:
http://userstyles.org/styles/31983

The reddit enhancement suite's features work decently well (turn the style tweaks off) but the configuration page needs restyling.  I'll work on that next.
